title: Amenorrhoea
content:
* There are things you can do to make your menstrual cycle more manageable.


![Smiling young woman at a social gathering with friends](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Women/Smiling-young-woman-at-a-social-gathering-with-friends-Canva.jpg)
QR Code Print
####  What are periods? (+ VIDEO) 
Your body prepares for a possible pregnancy every month after you reach puberty. If you don't get pregnant, the lining of your uterus (womb) sheds and passes out of your vagina.
